item.title: Audio Fingerprinting: A Quick Startup Guide
item.description: Audio fingerprinting has been widely used for music and sound identification. This technology enables a user to record as little as 2 seconds of an audio signal and identify the original sound that matches the signal with ~95.6% certainty.
